id: Louis Theroux: Altered States, review: Theroux is a sane presence in a weird world
paragraph:
Louis Theroux’s particular brand of documentary-making is now so well established that it has its own Twitter bot, pumping out such daily pitches as “I’m in Copenhagen to meet Cecilia, a former terrorist turned erotic accountant who believes eggs are a Jewish conspiracy.” Yet familiarity hasn’t blunted its impact; his recent films on alcohol addiction and transgender children are among the finest documentaries of recent years.His new three-parter, Altered States (BBC Two), began with a visit to Portland, Oregon (motto: “Keep Portland Weird”).
